txt.en: You have found a frightened child hiding in the ruins
Léofrun has been taken by the Orcs
You have escorted Léofrun to safety
While searching for survivors in Thornhope, you discovered a young, frightened child hiding near a burnt tree.
'I think I can make it from here!'
While searching for survivors in Thornhope, you discovered a young, frightened child hiding near a burnt tree.\n\nYou should help the child to safety.
Léofrun is hiding near a burnt tree in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Léofrun to safety.

'Please help me! I am scared... can you take me from here? I cannot find my mama!'

You tell the girl to run when you next distract the Orcs, and she nods, clearly still frightened.

You do not know if she will be able to make it on her own....
Léofrun is hiding near a burnt tree in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Léofrun to safety.
Léofrun is at Béortnoth's camp, outside of Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Léofrun when you return to Béortnoth's camp.
'Th-thank you, kind [placeholder]... am I safe now?'
Talk to Léofrun at Béortnoth's camp
